outline:
1. to practice divination, divine, observe signs, learn by experience, diligently observe, practice fortunetelling, take as an omen
    1. (Piel)
      1. to practice divination
      2. to observe the signs or omens
kjv_def: [idiom] certainly, divine, enchanter, (use) [idiom] enchantment, learn by experience, [idiom] indeed, diligently observe.
strongs_def: properly, to hiss, i.e. whisper a (magic) spell; generally, to prognosticate
